Html: After I get done raiding tonight, I'm going to release v2.2.19. That's like 12-3am PST range, so still lots of time. Have we got the filters figured out? Any other 3.2.2 changes for other models?
I need to get updated math for arcane cycles in. I have about half of it done, check with me before you push the release.
A filter for Onyxia's lair's items would be nice. Currently, these items only show up with "ALL" filter checked, they appear under no other filter.
I wouldn't hold my breath for perfect Ony item info so soon. WoWHead and the Armory have to get it figured out before Rawr can.
Some items already have the correct source in the info (e. g. item 49324), it just needs a filter option to display it without the "ALL" filter.

i notice something with the last update, as dps warr, i cant find the dual blade butcher 25normal in the weapon list. same with the alliance version.

already unchecked hide bad items... but in before this was'nt an issue

yeah, was an item filter problem, thanks

now i fell so dumb, doh
Checking in final 3.2.2 changes for TankDK in just a few.

I'm having some problems with the item filters. It's not displaying certain items unless I check "All"

For example,

Clemency: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47524

Sufferance: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47525

Everything else is checked.
That's to be expected, for items which don't have valid source data. That's the point of the ALL filter.

Astrylian wrote:

That's to be expected, for items which don't have valid source data. That's the point of the ALL filter.

Will it hurt the Build Upgrade list, if it's set to All, due to the bigger item pool?

I think that items that are only displayed when checking ALL should belong to another filter category. If I know I will never get items from T9 25 hard modes, I might want to disabled these, but I want to include unknown/Onyxia drops. I guess this was the "Other" filter in previous versions, it was nicer ...
I can't get the tribute chest items to appear unless I click the "all" button.  They don't seem to be in any of the other filters.
Just posted some new filter with the Heroic and Normal Onxy. This was setup with the current data, which I expect will be changing fast, but at least it has it in there now.

I'm having a somewhat related issue. When I check the "ALL" filter I can see the 245 ilvl Justicebringer Axe in the comparison pane. If I then do a "Build Upgrade List" the 245 Justicebringer wont be there (even though it's a huge upgrade), only the 258 Justicebringer will show up.
The Filters have been changed, ANYONE WITH PROBLEMS ABOUT THE FILTERS please hold off on new comments/issues until the current Unreleased ones come out, which include fixes.

I'm still having a problem with importing for my wife's priest. I get the items fine, gemmed and enchanted, but the stats aren't updated, the talents are shown, but not reflected (VT doesn't show up as an option, for example) and no gear shows up in the upgrade window.

I see my Ele shaman fine (and wow, was that a revelation).

Is there still an issue with priest profile loading or am I perhaps missing a step?
